text: Cells were activated with <extra_id_0> CD154 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - expressing insect cells for the times indicated .
As a negative control , cells were stimulated with insect cells lacking <extra_id_0> CD154 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 5 minute time point only ) .
Western blots of whole-cell lysates were probed with the indicated antibodies .

<extra_id_0> Phospho-IkappaBalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> pIkappaBalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and phospho - JNK ( pJNK ) blots were stripped and reprobed for total <extra_id_0> IkappaBalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and total JNK , respectively ( anti-JNK antibodies recognize p46 and p54 isoforms ) .
<extra_id_0> IkappaBalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> blots were also reprobed for actin to demonstrate equal lane loading .
Molecular weights are indicated at right .
Similar results were obtained in a second experiment and in two additional experiments with a second <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - deficient clone .
